name: Dwarva for Hire - a resume in twine
name_original: Dwarva for Hire - a resume in twine
description:
This is my resume, but in twine and in low fantasy format! Hire my tiny bearded self to write your words or organise your stuff. EDIT: Now updated! 

Cover image kindly provided by Jar O'Dragon! Check out her art at jarodragon.com!
